General.Name: Concrete Engineering Products
General.Description: Concrete Engineering Products Berhad manufactures and distributes prestressed spun concrete piles and poles in Malaysia. The company's spun concrete piles are used in the foundation piles for buildings, pile embankments, retaining walls, columns, bridges, ports, and marine structures; and poles are used for telecommunication, and electric power transmission and distribution lines, as well as traffic signal equipment and street lightings. It also exports its products to Asia, Africa, the Oceania, and the Gulf Region. The company was incorporated in 1982 and is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
